Name: Stela of User-nub
Description: The first register depicts Osiris on a block throne on the left, beneath a canopy. He is holding a crook (heqa-sceptre) and a flagellum (nekhakha-sceptre) in his hands. Above the canopy is a sun disc with a single wing. In front of Osiris are an offering table and a man making a gesture of adoration.In front of and above Osiris are inscriptions. The right half of the register are five columns containing the offering formula.The lower register shows two couples seated opposite each other. In between them is an offering table. Above their heads are inscriptions.
